item.title: By: Shane

item.description: Yeah I'm on MT. I'm sure there's a hack out there for it. Cheers on that!
item.content:encoded: Yeah I’m on MT. I’m sure there’s a hack out there for it. Cheers on that!

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Not too late. After 11:59pm PT tonight, then too late, but plenty of time now.
That favicon thing is a WP plugin, available <a href="http://dev.wp-plugins.org/wiki/favatars" rel="nofollow">here</a>. Not sure if it's easily reworked to other blog platforms, but works well for WordPress.
item.content:encoded:
Not too late. After 11:59pm PT tonight, then too late, but plenty of time now.

That favicon thing is a WP plugin, available here. Not sure if it’s easily reworked to other blog platforms, but works well for WordPress.

item.title: By: Shane

item.description: Hey! How did you get favicon's to appear in the comment box? Very clever, I want to do that!
item.content:encoded: Hey! How did you get favicon’s to appear in the comment box? Very clever, I want to do that!

item.content:encoded: I just emailed you one. Hope it’s not to late!
